Holy Cow Beef                                                              Texas Slim Cuts                                                              Event Tickets                              Producers                                Producers                                                              List My Ranch                                                              Rancher Criteria                              MapBlogBitcoinDonateConnect                                Contact                                                              Affiliate                              My SubscriptionsSearchLog inCartTHE BEEFINITIATIVEKnow your food, support your rancher Locally sourced, grassfed beef, delivered to your doorSHOP BEEF BOXESView MapLocally SourcedNO mRNA VaccinesWhat's Inside?BEST SELLERS Steak Lovers$175.00ADD TO CARTBEST SELLERS Texas Slim's Top Hand$290.00ADD TO CARTBEST SELLERS Platinum$165.00ADD TO CARTWho Are We?THE BEEF INITIATIVE IS A TRADE GROUP THAT IS FOCUSED ON MAKING FOOD MORE LOCALIZED, REDUNDANT, AND SECURE. WE SERVE OUR CUSTOMERS BY PROVIDING MARKET ACCESS TO PRODUCERS AND CONSUMERS WHO UNDERSTAND THE importance OF FOOD INTEGRITY.Mission StatementOur mission is to improve the health and security of our local communities through the expansion of market access to quality animal protein by building decentralized networks of values-aligned ranchers, processors, distributors, butchers, grocers, restaurants, and consumers and providing access to the tools necessary, including bitcoin, to form more secure localized food supply chains.ProvisionShowcase solutions for healthier lives and healthier budgets- through local cooperation.about our subscriptionsBeef delivered to your door in three easy steps!Choose Your RancherExplore our curated list of trusted ranchers. Select your preferred source for exceptional grass-fed and grass-finished beef.Choose Your BoxSelect the perfect box size to match your culinary needs and appetite. Options range from our "Basic Box" to our "Family Feast". Customize anytime!Choose Your PlanChoose from a monthly or a one-time plan. Don't like it? Cancel Anytime!Choose Your RancherCOMMITTED TO NATURAL BEEFOur Beef Box producers have pledged not to use any mRNA vaccines in their livestock. You can rest assured that the beef you purchase from us is produced using only safe and natural methods that align with our values.Read The PledgeBeef Initiative PledgeAs a producer of the Beef Initiative, we pledge to not use any mRNA vaccines in our livestock. We believe in using only safe and natural methods to raise healthy animals for consumption.We understand the importance of maintaining the integrity of our products and the trust of our customers. Therefore, we commit to not using any mRNA vaccines in our livestock and instead focus on preventative measures such as proper nutrition, sanitation, and herd management to ensure the well-being of our animals.We stand by our commitment to providing high-quality, safe, and natural beef to our customers.What's In Your Box?Looking for the perfect beef box? Our suppliers produce Angus beef that is free of antibiotics, added hormones, pesticides, and herbicides. We also go above and beyond organic practices to focus on animal welfare. This means our cattle are calm and stress-free, resulting in beef that is full of flavor. So why settle for anything less than the best? The box includes the following 3 tiers of meat in these proportions.15% Tier 1You're going to love the premium cuts that are in your box! You'll get 15% top-quality meat, which includes NY Strip Steak, Ribeye Steak, Flat Iron Steaks, Filet Steaks, and Filet Tips.35% Tier 2Your box is going to be packed with the best of beef. You're getting 35% mid-level cuts such as Skirt, Flank, Sirloin and Hanger Steak, as well as Roasts, Steak Tips and Tri-tip!50% Tier 3The next 50% of your box will contain all sorts of meaty delights. You’ll get ground beef, beef breakfast sausage, hamburger patties, beef german sausage, stew meat and more!Discover Our Boxes By RancherDiscover the ideal selection for you in our carefully curated assortment of grass-fed and grass-finished beef.choose your rancherNEWSLETTERFood IntelligenceSubscribe Via Email:SubscribePowered By The OSHI AppLeverage BitcoinEarn bitcoin rewards by using Oshi.Oshi helps local business and consumers leverage the bitcoin network to empower their community.Find it on the Apple App Store and Google Play store.Learn more about OshiBITCOIN PAYMENTS WITHStart taking bitcoin payments at the speed of lightning.GET STARTEDAbout TBI                            About Us                          Product & Tools                            Newsletter                                                      Sell Your Beef                                                      Download Oshi                          Community                            Texas Slim Twitter                                                      Oshi Twitter                                                      Oshi Website                                                      Developers                          Support                            Your Account                                                      Hire An Expert                                                      Contact Us                          More                            Podcasts                                                      Instagram                          Payment methodsAmerican ExpressApple PayDiners ClubDiscoverMeta PayGoogle PayMastercardPayPalShop PayVenmoVisa© 2023, Beef InitiativePowered By NextGenCode CompanyChoosing a selection results in a full page refresh.Opens in a new window.
